tgt_original: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 1 ||
hṛṣṭo hūkāravajraḥ paśupatidamako vajraghaṇṭā ca hṛṣṭā
stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 2 ||
saṃghastrailokyabandhurguṇagaṇanilayo bodhicittaḥ sucittaḥ  bodhiścānandasiddho vijitakalimalo heruko nīladaṇḍaḥ |
